description: Mailchimp is an email marketing and automation platform providing campaign templates, audience segmentation, and performance analytics to drive engagement and conversions

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_AUTOMATION
capabilities.description: Create a new classic automation in your Mailchimp account.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_BATCH_WEBHOOK
capabilities.description: Configure a webhook that will fire whenever any batch request completes processing. You may only have a maximum of 20 batch webhooks.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_CAMPAIGN
capabilities.description: Create a new Mailchimp campaign.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_CAMPAIGN_FEEDBACK
capabilities.description: Add feedback on a specific campaign.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_CAMPAIGN_FOLDER
capabilities.description: Create a new campaign folder.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_CART
capabilities.description: Add a new cart to a store.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_CART_LINE_ITEM
capabilities.description: Add a new line item to an existing cart.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_CONNECTED_SITE
capabilities.description: Create a new Mailchimp connected site.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_CUSTOMER
capabilities.description: Add a new customer to a store.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_DOMAIN_TO_ACCOUNT
capabilities.description: Add a domain to the account.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_EVENT
capabilities.description: Add an event for a list member.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_EXPORT
capabilities.description: Create a new account export in your Mailchimp account.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_FILE
capabilities.description: Upload a new image or file to the File Manager.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_FOLDER
capabilities.description: Create a new folder in the File Manager.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_INTEREST_CATEGORY
capabilities.description: Create a new interest category.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_INTEREST_IN_CATEGORY
capabilities.description: Create a new interest or 'group name' for a specific category.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_LANDING_PAGE
capabilities.description: Create a new Mailchimp landing page.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_LIST
capabilities.description: Create a new list in your Mailchimp account.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_MEMBER_NOTE
capabilities.description: Add a new note for a specific subscriber.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_MEMBER_TO_LIST
capabilities.description: Add a new member to the list.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_MEMBER_TO_SEGMENT
capabilities.description: Add a member to a static segment.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_MERGE_FIELD
capabilities.description: Add a new merge field for a specific audience.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_ORDER
capabilities.description: Add a new order to a store.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_ORDER_LINE_ITEM
capabilities.description: Add a new line item to an existing order.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_OR_REMOVE_MEMBER_TAGS
capabilities.description: Add or remove tags from a list member. If a tag that does not exist is passed in and set as 'active', a new tag will be created.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_OR_UPDATE_CUSTOMER
capabilities.description: Add or update a customer.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_OR_UPDATE_LIST_MEMBER
capabilities.description: Add or update a list member.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_OR_UPDATE_PRODUCT_VARIANT
capabilities.description: Add or update a product variant.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_PRODUCT
capabilities.description: Add a new product to a store.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_PRODUCT_IMAGE
capabilities.description: Add a new image to the product.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_PRODUCT_VARIANT
capabilities.description: Add a new variant to the product.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_PROMO_CODE
capabilities.description: Add a new promo code to a store.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_PROMO_RULE
capabilities.description: Add a new promo rule to a store.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_SEGMENT
capabilities.description: Create a new segment in a specific list.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_STORE
capabilities.description: Add a new store to your Mailchimp account.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_SUBSCRIBER_TO_WORKFLOW_EMAIL
capabilities.description: Manually add a subscriber to a workflow, bypassing the default trigger settings. You can also use this endpoint to trigger a series of automated emails in an API 3.0 workflow type.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_TEMPLATE
capabilities.description: Create a new template for the account. Only Classic templates are supported.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_TEMPLATE_FOLDER
capabilities.description: Create a new template folder.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ADD_WEBHOOK
capabilities.description: Create a new webhook for a specific list.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ARCHIVE_AUTOMATION
capabilities.description: Archiving will permanently end your automation and keep the report data. You’ll be able to replicate your archived automation, but you can’t restart it.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_ARCHIVE_LIST_MEMBER
capabilities.description: Archive a list member. To permanently delete, use the delete-permanent action.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_BATCH_ADD_OR_REMOVE_MEMBERS
capabilities.description: Batch add/remove list members to static segment

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_BATCH_SUBSCRIBE_OR_UNSUBSCRIBE
capabilities.description: Batch subscribe or unsubscribe list members.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_CAMPAIGN_ABUSE_REPORT_DETAILS
capabilities.description: Get information about a specific abuse report for a campaign.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_CAMPAIGN_STATISTICS_FEEDBACK
capabilities.description: Get feedback based on a campaign's statistics. Advice feedback is based on campaign stats like opens, clicks, unsubscribes, bounces, and more.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_CANCEL_CAMPAIGN
capabilities.description: Cancel a Regular or Plain-Text Campaign after you send, before all of your recipients receive it. This feature is included with Mailchimp Pro.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_CREATE_A_SURVEY_CAMPAIGN
capabilities.description: Utilize the List ID and Survey ID to generate a Campaign that links to your survey.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_CUSTOMER_JOURNEYS_API_TRIGGER_FOR_A_CONTACT
capabilities.description: Create a trigger step in the Customer Journey builder via the API. Use the provided URL with {journey_id} and {step_id} to activate conditions for a contact.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_CUSTOMIZE_SIGNUP_FORM
capabilities.description: Customize a list's default signup form.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_DELETE_BATCH_REQUEST
capabilities.description: Stops a batch request from running. Since only one batch request is run at a time, this can be used to cancel a long running request. The results of any completed operations will not be available after this call.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_DELETE_BATCH_WEBHOOK
capabilities.description: Remove a batch webhook. Webhooks will no longer be sent to the given URL.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_DELETE_CAMPAIGN
capabilities.description: Remove a campaign from your Mailchimp account.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_DELETE_CAMPAIGN_FEEDBACK_MESSAGE
capabilities.description: Remove a specific feedback message for a campaign.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_DELETE_CAMPAIGN_FOLDER
capabilities.description: Delete a specific campaign folder, and mark all the campaigns in the folder as 'unfiled'.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_DELETE_CART
capabilities.description: Delete a cart.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_DELETE_CART_LINE_ITEM
capabilities.description: Delete a specific cart line item.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_DELETE_CONNECTED_SITE
capabilities.description: Remove a connected site from your Mailchimp account.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_DELETE_CUSTOMER
capabilities.description: Delete a customer from a store.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_DELETE_DOMAIN
capabilities.description: Delete a verified domain from the account.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_DELETE_FILE
capabilities.description: Remove a specific file from the File Manager.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_DELETE_FOLDER
capabilities.description: Delete a specific folder in the File Manager.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_DELETE_INTEREST_CATEGORY
capabilities.description: Delete a specific interest category.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_DELETE_INTEREST_IN_CATEGORY
capabilities.description: Delete interests or group names in a specific category.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_DELETE_LANDING_PAGE
capabilities.description: Delete a landing page.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_DELETE_LIST
capabilities.description: Delete a list from your Mailchimp account. If you delete a list, you'll lose the list history—including subscriber activity, unsubscribes, complaints, and bounces. You’ll also lose subscribers’ email addresses, unless you exported and backed up your list.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_DELETE_LIST_MEMBER
capabilities.description: Delete all personally identifiable information related to a list member, and remove them from a list. This will make it impossible to re-import the list member.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_DELETE_MERGE_FIELD
capabilities.description: Delete a specific merge field.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_DELETE_NOTE
capabilities.description: Delete a specific note for a specific list member.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_DELETE_ORDER
capabilities.description: Delete an order.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_DELETE_ORDER_LINE_ITEM
capabilities.description: Delete a specific order line item.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_DELETE_PRODUCT
capabilities.description: Delete a product.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_DELETE_PRODUCT_IMAGE
capabilities.description: Delete a product image.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_DELETE_PRODUCT_VARIANT
capabilities.description: Delete a product variant.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_DELETE_PROMO_CODE
capabilities.description: Delete a promo code from a store.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_DELETE_PROMO_RULE
capabilities.description: Delete a promo rule from a store.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_DELETE_SEGMENT
capabilities.description: Delete a specific segment in a list.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_DELETE_STORE
capabilities.description: Delete a store. Deleting a store will also delete any associated subresources, including Customers, Orders, Products, and Carts.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_DELETE_TEMPLATE
capabilities.description: Delete a specific template.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_DELETE_TEMPLATE_FOLDER
capabilities.description: Delete a specific template folder, and mark all the templates in the folder as 'unfiled'.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_DELETE_WEBHOOK
capabilities.description: Delete a specific webhook in a list.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_DELETE_WORKFLOW_EMAIL
capabilities.description: Removes an individual classic automation workflow email. Emails from certain workflow types, including the Abandoned Cart Email (abandonedCart) and Product Retargeting Email (abandonedBrowse) Workflows, cannot be deleted.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_GET_ABUSE_REPORT
capabilities.description: Get details about a specific abuse report.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_GET_ACCOUNT_EXPORT_INFO
capabilities.description: Get information about a specific account export.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_GET_AUTHORIZED_APP_INFO
capabilities.description: Get information about a specific authorized application.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_GET_AUTOMATED_EMAIL_SUBSCRIBER
capabilities.description: Get information about a specific subscriber in a classic automation email queue.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_GET_AUTOMATION_INFO
capabilities.description: Get a summary of an individual classic automation workflow's settings and content. The `trigger_settings` object returns information for the first email in the workflow.

capabilities.name: MAILCHIMP_GET_BATCH_OPERATION_STATUS
capabilities.description: Get the status of a batch request.

capabilities.description: Get information about a specific batch webhook.
